servinfo.title: DTC P2119: Throttle Actuator Control Throttle Body Range / Performance

servinfosub.title: Wiring Diagram
servinfosub.ptxt: Refer to DTC P2101: Throttle Actuator Control Motor Circuit Range / Performance .

servinfosub.title: DTC Detecting Condition and Trouble Area

entry.ptxt: Difference between the measured (actual) throttle valve opening angle and the target throttle valve opening angle which is calculated based on accelerator pedal opening angle and engine condition is more than specification for specified time continuously.

s1.ptxt: With ignition switch turned OFF, connect scan tool.
Turn ON ignition switch and clear DTC using scan tool.
Keep the accelerator pedal at idle position for 2 seconds.
Keep the accelerator pedal at fully depressed position for 2 seconds.

attention3.ptxt: Before this trouble shooting is performed, read the precautions for DTC troubleshooting referring to Precautions For DTC Troubleshooting .

testgroup.question: Was “Engine and Emission Control System Check” performed?

action.ptxt: Go to Engine and Emission Control System Check .

testgroup.title: Electric throttle body assembly system check

test1.ptxt: Connect scan tool to DLC with ignition switch turned OFF.
Turn ON ignition switch, check each voltage of “TP Sensor 1 Volt” and “TP Sensor 2 Volt” displayed on scan tool when accelerator pedal is idle position and fully depressed.

testgroup.question: Is displayed each TP sensor value as described voltage in Scan Tool Data ?

action.ptxt: Intermittent trouble. Check for intermittent referring to Intermittent and Poor Connection Inspection .

test1.ptxt: Disconnect connector from electric throttle body assembly with ignition switch turned OFF.
Check for proper connection to electric throttle body assembly at “BLU/YEL” and “BLU/RED” wire terminals.
Check for proper connection to ECM at “C37-45” and “C37-44” terminals.
Measure resistance at following connector terminals.

item.ptxt: Between “BLU/YEL” wire terminal of electric throttle body assembly connector and “C37-45” terminal of ECM connector
Between “BLU/RED” wire terminal of electric throttle body assembly connector and “C37-44” terminal of ECM connector

action.ptxt: “BLU/YEL” wire and/or “BLU/RED” wire is open or high resistance.

test1.ptxt: Check electric throttle body assembly referring to “Electric Throttle Body Assembly and Its Circuit Check” under Electric Throttle Body Assembly On-Vehicle Inspection .

action.ptxt: Substitute a known-good ECM and recheck.
